entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
